title: [Old Headers] Issue "Only one header dependency expected" cause OldHeaders to stop progressing
body:
**Description**
During a sync of mainnet chain there was a exception:
```
System.InvalidOperationException: Only one header dependency expected (HEADERS [10013980, 10014171](192) [HIGH] [times: S:2ms|R:191ms|V:0ms|W:0ms|H:0ms|A:438ms, retries 2] min#: 10014171 [H   S ][      ][Peer|eth68|17682771|   34.29.26.252:30303| Out])
   at Nethermind.Synchronization.FastBlocks.HeadersSyncFeed.InsertHeaders(HeadersSyncBatch batch) in /src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Synchronization/FastBlocks/FastHeadersSyncFeed.cs:line 472
   at Nethermind.Synchronization.FastBlocks.HeadersSyncFeed.HandleResponse(HeadersSyncBatch batch, PeerInfo peer) in /src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Synchronization/FastBlocks/FastHeadersSyncFeed.cs:line 437
   at Nethermind.Synchronization.ParallelSync.SyncDispatcher`1.DoHandleResponse(T request, PeerInfo allocatedPeer) in /src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Synchronization/ParallelSync/SyncDispatcher.cs:line 198
```
Then I've noticed that my OldHeaders stopped progressing (error ocured at progress "7,668,288"):
```
13 Jul 2023 08:30:54.588
 Old Headers   7,668,288 / 17,682,459 ( 43.37 %) | queue   116,928 | current            0 Blk/s | total        2,185 Blk/s
```
